title: Session Quality Score Breakdown
prompt: Create a quality score dashboard showing kill zone scoring components. Top: Large circular progress ring showing total score '85/100' in center with 'Kill Zone Score' label. Below: Four horizontal component bars showing individual scores: 'Session Active' (0-30 points) with clock icon, 'Overlap Bonus' (0-20 points) with intersection icon, 'Day of Week' (0-25 points) with calendar icon, 'Time to Close' (0-25 points) with countdown icon. Each bar is a gradient from red (0) through yellow to green (max). Current values marked with indicator. Right side: Quality badge showing 'HIGH QUALITY' in green or 'LOW QUALITY' in red. Dark slate background (#1E293B). Modern score dashboard aesthetic.
negative_prompt: inconsistent bar sizes, overlapping elements, hard to read scores, too colorful
